definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The government decapitalized industry and commerce with harsh tax policies.
sentences.chinese: 该政府通过苛刻的税收政策从工商界抽取资本。

sentences.english: First, one can listen to what businesspeople say.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你可以去听听工商界人士怎么说。

sentences.english: Besides, the two Prime Ministers also jointly met with representatives from the Czech business community on the evening of December 8.
sentences.chinese: 此外，两国总理8日晚还共同会见了捷克工商界代表。

sentences.english: There were also over 500 businesspersons attending the Forum.
sentences.chinese: 两国工商界共500多人参加了论坛。

sentences.english: People in political circles and business circles spend much time on clothing, they have good manners.
sentences.chinese: 政界和工商界人士普遍衣饰讲究，言行举止规矩大方。

sentences.english: About 800 participants from the Asian and European business communities attended the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 来自亚洲和欧洲约800名工商界人士出席开幕式。

sentences.english: More than 500 people from the business circles of the two countries attended the forum.
sentences.chinese: 两国工商界人士500多人参加了论坛。

sentences.english: We are encouraged by the close alignment between the JCCT process and the priorities of the business community.
sentences.chinese: JCCT和工商界的优先级如此一致让我们倍感鼓舞。

definition: all walks of life/all social circles
